divs: Sighting Detailswhile setting in theswing overlooking old hickory lake i notice objects droppingdown from the sky unlike aircraft or fireworks and im sure other reports will back this up they were following an irrugularflight path when they blink they seemed tojump great distance the paths of the six craft i observed dropped down fromthe sky with great brilliance in a blood red color and went north east for severalminutes then as u can tell shot at great speed into space please relay all video of this event to utube this was a real sighting and not a hoax look for any reports or video of ufos out of nashville tn 4 july 9 pm for verification thank you very much out
